evidence.text: Person A: You're going to give your mother a heart attack if you keep on disappearing like that.

Person A: No, sweetie. That's who pays for your matinées. What did you "not see"?
Person A: Look, while this ambassador thing's still going on, I don't want you going out at night.
Person A: ... a photo of me crossing Abbey Road, just to make you jealous.
Person B: Might I have the honor of a dance with this young lady?

Person A: Why are you asking him?
Person B: Will you put me on your dance card?
Person A: No way.
